projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
For most modules on https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ we have GitHub issues enabled and a fair number of them have old, open issues and PRs:

* https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.storekit/issues
* https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.styledlabel/issues
* https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.imagefactory/issues

We should go through all of these modules and decide to either:

* [Archive|https://github.com/appcelerator-archive] the module and clearly mark as unmaintained.
** Modules like {{ti.urbainairship}} and {{ti.googleanalytics}} that conflict our interests
** Modules like {{ti.styledlabel}} that have been made obsolete by core APIs (AttributedStrings)
** Modules in bad shape and no priority to fix that
* Go through issues, close or move them to JIRA and then disable GitHub issues

/cc [~hansknoechel]
fields.summary: Maintenance: Move issues from (and then close on) GitHub to JIRA or archive as unmaintained

comments.body: Closed as completed. If this is in error, please reopen.
